title: Looking for diamond+ Jungler+Top Lane Teams! (D1 teams last season)
body:
Hi there, 

Our old Team Escape was diamond 1 last season and are looking for a new jungler + Top lane to go along with our new team. 
We were all diamond solo queue last season and we are looking for someone who has some/a lot of experience with different teams
and has a dedicated mindset going along with us into the future of the Oceanic competitive eSports scene. 

If you are interested please message me in game "Hi Im Trueshot" for further information.

Thank you.
